definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "pin"), an ancient Korean writing system
to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide

sentences.english: In that night was Belshazzar the king of the Chaldeans slain.
sentences.chinese: 当夜，迦勒底王伯沙撒被杀。

sentences.english: He says some people admitted they had killed their children.
sentences.chinese: 他说一些人承认他们曾杀过自己的孩子。

sentences.english: Suddenly the hero's son picked up a knife and killed the dragon.
sentences.chinese: 突然英雄的儿子拿起刀杀了龙。

sentences.english: The potential of oils as new types of larvicides for the control of mosquitoes are explored.
sentences.chinese: 这两种油品可开发用作防治蚊虫的新型杀幼虫药剂。

sentences.english: It's carrion! Who killed that man?
sentences.chinese: 不过是一具腐烂的尸体罢了，谁杀了这个人？

sentences.english: The second emperor committed suicide; Zhao Gao eventually was killed.
sentences.chinese: 秦朝第二个皇帝自尽而死，赵高被杀。

sentences.english: But Rappaccini's medicine has also killed many people.
sentences.chinese: 但是拉帕奇尼的药也杀了很多人。

sentences.english: The next day, Kenzo was killed and Akimi disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，健三被杀身亡，雅美也不见了踪影。

sentences.english: Housework done properly can kill you.
sentences.chinese: 适当地干家务活会杀了你。

sentences.english: And at that time forty-two thousand of Ephraim fell.
sentences.chinese: 那时以法莲人被杀的有四万二千。

sentences.english: Turn in your gun, or I will kill you.
sentences.chinese: 把枪交出来，否则我会杀了你。

sentences.english: The king's men had been subverted and they killed him in the night.
sentences.chinese: 国王的属下已被策反，在夜里把国王杀了。

sentences.english: On that day the number of those that were slain in Shushan the palace was brought before the king.
sentences.chinese: 当日，将书珊城被杀的人数呈在王前。

sentences.english: Chinese man gets death penalty for murdering 13.
sentences.chinese: 杀13人通缉犯成瑞龙佛山获死刑。

sentences.english: These were the first spermicides on condoms.18
sentences.chinese: 并且在避孕套中首次用了杀精药。

sentences.english: We’ll need to be in the final if we want the trophy.
sentences.chinese: 要拿大耳朵奖杯的话，我们必须杀进决赛。

definition: to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
to pick/to choose/to fight a duel
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
